The main advantage of the Hyundai (other than the relative price) over the Kluger is that it is a diesel, and pretty good one at that. Economy and crusing is pretty good but the copious torque does cause the same problems on-road reported -road. The Kluger advantages over the Santa is its larger interior and Comfort.
